headline: Should S&P Global's (SPGI) Upgraded Outlook and Major Buybacks Spark Investor Action?
summary: S&P Global Inc. recently reported third-quarter 2025 results, highlighting sales of US$3.89 billion and net income of US$1.18 billion, while raising its full-year earnings guidance to a GAAP diluted EPS range of US$14.80–US$15.05. Alongside these positive financial results, the company completed a significant share buyback program, repurchasing over 22.57 million shares since October 2022 for more than US$10 billion. With S&P Global raising its full-year earnings outlook, we'll explore how...
